sections.description:
Powerfull AMP integration for WordPress

FEATURES:
– Google Page Speed Optimized
– Full Comment System Support
– Related Post Support
– Menu Support
– Google Analytics Support
– Personalizable Color Scheme
– Personalizable Section Titles

What\’s in RoadMap?

  • Full Page Support
  • Search Support
  • Taxonomy Support
  • Front End Customizer Support
  • Extras Templates to Choose
  • Better Options Menu

If there are any special features that you would like to implement, just let me know

Plugin based in part on :

  • https://isabelcastillo.com/related-posts-wp-amp
  • https://www.billerickson.net/code/adding-menu-amp-header/
  • https://medium.com/@surajair/creating-comment-form-on-amp-pages-in-wordpress-9dd675ba383b
sections.installation:
1 – Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2- Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3- Install the AMP Required plugin
4- You may need to refresh your permalinks by going to Settings > Permalinks and tapping the Save button.
5- Enjoy!
sections.faq:
• What other plugins are required?
    Just AMP Plugin from Automattic

-Do you offer support?
Yes, but limited.
We offer an integration service for AMP in WordPress with dedicated support via tickets for a monthly cost.
The support we provide for WordPress forums will not have a quick response as paid support, but the answers will exist.

-Will this plugin continue to be developed in the future by implementing new features?
Yes, just check the Road Map in the description.

-Will there be support for ads?

Yes, we will soon be launching a plugin to implement ads totally free. Also this plugin will have a payment version with advanced functions.

Installation Instructions

1 – Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2- Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3- Install the AMP Required plugin
4- You may need to refresh your permalinks by going to Settings > Permalinks and tapping the Save button.
5- Enjoy!
